sentences.en: A district or province governed by a viceroy.
sentences.cn: 总督管辖的地区或者省份.

sentences.en: And the viceroy was there with his lady.
How do you think this trade viceroy will deal with the chancellor's demands?
sentences.cn: 贸易总督会怎样回应首相的要求 呢 ?

sentences.en: Mr Amery telegraphed in this sense to the Viceroy on the same day.
sentences.cn: 艾默里先生于同日将此意电告总督.

sentences.en: Shunzhi thirteen years, he was appointed Viceroy Zhedong Xuezheng of western Zhejiang Qian local matter.
sentences.cn: 顺治十三年, 任提督浙东浙西地方的学政佥事.

words.tran_cn: 总督夫人；女总督；副王夫人
总督的职位（职权或辖区）
总督；（北美）一种黑色蝴蝶

trans.tran_cn: （代表国王管辖行省或殖民地等的）总督
trans.tran_en: a man who was sent by a king or queen in the past to rule another country
